summary: On the eve of their children's marriage, NYC in-laws Sheldon Kornpett and Vince Ricardo embark on a series of misadventures involving the CIA, the Treasury Department and Central American dictators.
cast: Peter Falk|Alan Arkin|Richard Libertini|Nancy Dussault|Penny Peyser|Arlene Golonka|Michael Lembeck|Paul L. Smith|Carmine Caridi|Ed Begley Jr.|Sammy Smith|James Hong|Barbara Dana|Rozsika Halmos|Álvaro Carcaño|Jorge Zepeda|Sergio Calderón|David Paymer|Kent Williams|John Hancock|John Finnegan|Brass Adams|Eduardo Noriega|Danny Kwan|Maurice Sneed|Rosanna DeSoto|Jim Goodwin|Mitchell Group|Carmen Dragon|Peter Miller|Hanna King|Dick Wieand|Carlos Montalbo|Tom Degidon|Tony DiFalco|John Daheim|Art Evans|John Hostetter|Bill Houston|Terry Bolo|Drew Michaels|Judith Garwood|Ellen Clark
keywords: neo screwball comedy|dentist|central america|wedding|armored car robbery
title: Los suegros
